title: How to Cancel a Domino's Pizza Order on the App, Over the Phone, or Online

steps.title: Call the location you ordered from and ask to cancel your order.
steps.content: Call the location you ordered from and ask to cancel your order. Contacting the Domino’s where you placed your order is the easiest and most efficient way to cancel an order. Simply search the store location online to get their phone number, and then give them a ring. Keep in mind that cancellation policies vary across Domino’s locations, so there’s no guarantee that you can cancel your order and receive a full refund. Speak to your local store’s manager for more information about their specific rules.

steps.title: Or, contact Domino’s Customer Support at 1 (734) 930-3030.
steps.content: Or, contact Domino’s Customer Support at 1 (734) 930-3030. The Domino’s Customer Support team is also available to assist you 24/7! If you can’t get through to your local Domino’s, reach out to Domino’s Customer Support team at 1 (734) 930-3030. A Domino’s employee or representative can help you cancel your order quickly and efficiently. Don’t want to talk on the phone? Use Domino’s live chat feature to message a representative.

If you ordered a pizza on Domino's website , you can easily reach Customer Support through the webpage. Follow these instructions for how to do so: Log in to your Domino’s account (if you haven’t already done so). Scroll down to the bottom of the Home page. Click “Customer Support” under “Customer Service.” You’ll be redirected to the Domino’s FAQ webpage . Locate the “Send us an email” header. Select the “click here” link to contact Customer Support about canceling your order. You’ll be redirected to Domino’s live chat feature to message a representative.

If you ordered a pizza through the Domino’s app, you can be directed to where to cancel your order with the click of a button. Simply open the Domino’s app, log into your Domino’s account (if you’ve been logged out), and follow these steps: Click on the 3 horizontal lines in the top left corner. Select “Customer Support.” You’ll be redirected to the Domino’s FAQ webpage . Locate the “Send us an email” header. Select the “click here” link to contact Customer Support about canceling your order. Note that there is no direct "Cancel order" option in the app.

If you ordered Domino’s through a third party food delivery app like GrubHub, DoorDash, or Uber Eats, you will have to follow their cancellation guidelines. Many third party apps allow you to cancel the order if you cancel it before it’s been prepared. Cancel an order on GrubHub by going to “My Orders,” selecting your Domino’s order, tapping “Help” in the under right-hand corner, and then clicking “Cancel order.” Cancel on DoorDash by selecting the order in the “Orders” menu, tapping “Help” in the upper right-hand corner, and then selecting “Cancel Order.” [1] X Research source Cancel an order on Uber Eats by logging into your account and chatting with a representative at this link .

steps.title: You will get a refund for a canceled Domino's order.
steps.content: You will get a refund for a canceled Domino's order. Domino’s guarantees that if you’re not satisfied, they’ll refund your purchase or make it right. [2] X Research source If you cancel your order or have any other request for a refund, Domino’s will do their best to accommodate. Refunds will appear in your chosen payment method within 5 to 7 business days. If you have a specific question about your refund or don’t see a refund in your account after 7 business days, contact Domino’s Customer Support at 1 (734) 930-3030 or through live chat .

steps.title: Domino’s can cancel an order because of misconduct or unavailability.
steps.content: Domino’s can cancel an order because of misconduct or unavailability. Domino’s has a right to cancel any order if they feel the customer or deliverer’s safety is at risk. [3] X Research source Here are the most common reasons why Domino’s may cancel and order: The customer’s number was previously used in hoax or scam orders. The customer did not come to pick up their carryout order. The delivery address is known to be abusive. The delivery address is undeliverable. Domino’s is unable to contact a customer about their order.
